Job Description

Overview:

We are looking for a skilled Odoo software developer to work alongside our business unit to develop software solutions to solve business problems and create efficient data systems and processes. This role will act as the go-to subject expert in the domains of web development and database management.



Responsibilities:

 Develop modules, apps, and interfaces using Python, Javascript and XML.

 Customize Odoo per customers requirements and specifications.

 Manage and prioritize customer requests and requirements.

 Write clear, concise and efficient code.

 Assist in the design, development, and deployment of new data structures

 Enter, review and quality control enterprise data.

 Manage and develop efficient data management processes.



Requirements:

 4+ years professional experience with Python, SQL, and excel.

 2+ years experience with Odoo.



Programming Skills in the Following: Python, OOP, API, PostgreSQL, HTML, CSS, JS/Jquery, XML, XPath, and QWeb.

 Bachelor s degree or equivalent in Computer Science or related STEM field.



Demonstrated Experience:

 Working with Github or Bitbucket.

 Translating business problems into analytical frameworks.

 Establishing priorities, multi-tasking, work independently, and complete objectives in a fast-paced and demanding work environment.

 Preparing reports and analysis to clearly communicate complex subjects matter to senior management.



What We Are Looking For In Candidates:

 Intrinsically motivated.

 Positive and Collaborative Attitude.

 Ability to communicate clearly and concisely.
